extension.name: MOSKitt UML Statemachine Diagram Editor problems

constraint.name: Unique name in model container
constraint.description: Checks an element's name to be unique in its container.
constraint.message: Another element exists with that name.

command.description: Create a new UML2 StateMachine Diagram
command.name: New StateMachine Diagram

command.label: Create StateMachine Diagram
command.tooltip: Create a new StateMachine diagram (Papyrus II)
